Metadata.name: Emulation Essentials
Metadata.author: ShrineFox, Sierrai17
Metadata.description:
Essential mods for emulating Persona 3 FES with PCSX2.
--
hostFS: Expands the memory size of the game executable and loads mods into the game.
Silence sceOpen Errors: Stops "sceOpen error" messages from flooding the PCSX2 log.
